description:
After being discovered by Ichimaru when she was making out with a student, she invited Ichimaru out for tea to talk about it the following day. This tea date took her by surprise, when she experienced the kind personality of Ichimaru. She fell in love.
She was an ace in volleyball during high school.
Lives alone, but sometimes visits her little brother at their family kitchen.
name: Iwasaki-sensei
